testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: CleanNFT has completely changed how I approach recycling. Earning NFTs for my recycling actions makes it so much more rewarding and engaging!

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.text: The blockchain integration is seamless. I love that my recycling NFTs are stored on Polygon - fast, low-cost, and truly mine. This is the future of sustainable rewards!

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The QR code scanning is super easy and the badges are motivating. My friends and I compete to see who can recycle more - it's like a game that actually helps the planet!

testimonials.name: David Park
